subject: Football
Relocation of Business
lead_paragraph: After months of speculation about whether the Chargers, the Raiders or the Rams would move to Los Angeles for the 2015 season, all three teams told the N.F.L. that they would remain in their cities next year, according to a source with knowledge of the decisions.
